regen.absent_element: alert to operator for executing beyond permitted levels
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator if the operator attempts to execute a function beyond the permitted interaction level.

regen.absent_element: alerting system when executing beyond permitted interaction level
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator when executing functions beyond the permitted interaction level.

regen.absent_element: alerting of operators when executing beyond permitted interaction levels
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall alert operators if an attempt is made to execute a function beyond the allowed interaction level.

label: The TCS shall inform the operator if the operator attempts to execute a function prohibited as a result of the determined level of interaction.
absence: Warning for execution of functions prohibited according to determined interaction levels
